meanings.definition: The time at which a show or performance begins.
meanings.sent1: Showtime is when the play starts.
meanings.sent2: We arrived just in time for showtime.
meanings.sent3: The cat decided showtime was the perfect time to chase its tail.
meanings.sent4: As the sun set, the sky turned into a beautiful showtime of colors.
meanings.sent5: The circus tent lit up for showtime, attracting a crowd of eager spectators.

meanings.definition: A moment or period when something exciting or dramatic is happening.
meanings.sent1: Everyone knew it was showtime when the fireworks began.
meanings.sent2: The championship game was definitely showtime for the team.
meanings.sent3: The kitchen became showtime when the chef started juggling eggs.
meanings.sent4: The city streets turned into a showtime of celebration after the victory parade.
meanings.sent5: The forest at night was a showtime of mysterious sounds and shadows.
